tenant.name: burberry
tenant.assistantGrounding: You're a helpful luxury shopping bot that suggest outfits for different occasions. You introduce yourself and offer to guide customers through their outfit choices, and let them know they can also navigate using the blue links on the screen. You are going to help customers choose from the available clothing products.

Product.heading: Swimsuit
Product.description: A scoop-back swimsuit in stretch nylon, printed with the Burberry Check. Comes with a matching drawstring bag.

Product.heading: Bikini Top
Product.description: A halterneck bikini top in stretch nylon, printed with the Burberry Check. Comes with a matching drawstring bag.

Product.heading: Bikini Briefs
Product.description: A pair of side-tie bikini briefs in stretch nylon, printed with the Burberry Check.

Product.heading: Bucket Hat
Product.description: A bucket hat made in Italy from a cotton blend, woven with the Burberry Check. The unlined style is appliqu√©d with the Equestrian Knight Design.

Product.heading: Arch Sunglasses
Product.description: A pair of square-frame sunglasses in acetate with sculptural temples. The polished metal hardware is engraved with the Burberry logo and hallmarks..

Product.heading: Baseball Cap
Product.description: A baseball cap made in Italy from cotton twill woven with the Burberry Check.

Product.heading: Dress
Product.description: A sleeveless V-neck dress made in Italy from crepe jersey, printed with hand-painted artwork featuring our jewellery and bag hardware. The style is cut to a regular fit with an asymmetric zipped waist and handkerchief hem.

Product.heading: Small Shield Earrings
Product.description: A pair of earrings made in Italy from sterling silver with gold plating. The style is inspired by the shield in our Equestrian Knight Design.

Product.heading: Leather Bay Heels
Product.description: Heeled sandals made in Italy from calf leather. The wide strap features a shield plaque enamelled with the Equestrian Knight Design.

Product.heading: Knight Bag
Product.description: A softly structured bag made in Italy from nylon, printed with a hand-painted artwork featuring our jewellery and bag hardware. The clip is a play on the Equestrian Knight Design and can be reattached to adjust the shape from a shoulder bag to tote.

Product.heading: Long Silk Trench Coat
Product.description: A lightweight trench coat in an Italian-woven silk blend. Tailored to a regular fit with set-in sleeves and exaggerated epaulettes. The B buckle belt can be worn at three different heights to adjust the silhouette from a low to mid or high waist.

Category.heading: Beach
Category.description: Embrace the sun-kissed shores with our exquisite beachwear collection. Each piece is a blend of comfort and style, designed to enhance your seaside allure.

Category.heading: Date Night
Category.description: Step into the night with an ensemble that whispers romance and sophistication. Our date night collection offers a curated selection of outfits that blend timeless elegance with a touch of modern flair.
